data.oai_dc:dc: Field and lab experiment data on Idotea balthica

File contains all data from field and lab experiments on Idotea balthica. Specific tabs: Field Collections: Body size of isopods collected from field, Lab Cultures: Body size of isopods raised in common garden environment, Egg Data: Data on egg numbers dissected from field collected females vs. female length and dry weight, Egg Size: Data on sizes of eggs dissected from field collected females vs. female length, Survivorship Data: Survivorship of isopods raised across a range of temperatures, Growth Data: Growth of isopods across a range of temperatures, Reproductive Data: Time to and size at maturity data for isopods raised at 18 and 24 degrees, June Predation: Predation rates from field tethering experiments conducted in June, August Predation: Predation rates from field tethering experiments conducted in August.
